0.cdata!:
Maroc - Projet d'Appui a
            l'Initiative Nationale pour le Developpement Humain

trustfund:
TF057391-BREAKING THE BARRIERS TO YOUTH
            INCLUSION IN MOROCCO

abstracts.cdata!:
The National Human Development
            Initiative (INDH) Project for Morocco will assist the
            Government in improving inclusiveness, accountability and
            transparency of decision making and implementation processes
            at the local level in order to enhance use of social and
            economic infrastructure and services by poor and vulnerable
            groups.  The project is composed of the following
            components: component one - alleviate poverty in rural
            areas; component two: alleviate social exclusion in urban
            areas; component three - alleviate extreme vulnerability;
            and component four - mainstreaming INDH governance
            mechanisms and strengthening of institutional capacity.
